Any chance we can get VAB craft files with the different variations of the SLS?

11 hours ago, ifpgavin said:

Any chance we can get VAB craft files with the different variations of the SLS?

Not craft files but there instructions on how to build them on my unofficial reDirect wiki (link in my sig below)

I have an idea for a Phase 3 lander.

Lockheed Martin proposed a lander that used Orion parts to make. The crew cabin looks like an Orion capsule and maybe you could make a b9 part switch variant, stock variant, or another part.

Here are some pics:

The whole capsule could be 2.5 meters in diameter and the top 1.875 meters in diameter, with a .9375 meter diameter attachment point to put the C-100 Androgynous Docking Mechanism

This is just an idea and you can change it up a bit, I do not mind.

(Edit): The rest of the lander can be 3.75 meters wide with 1.25 meter diameter engines at the bottom.

Edited November 21, 2020 by Naeth Kerman

This is just an idea and you can change it up a bit, I do not mind.

(Edit): The rest of the lander can be 3.75 meters wide with 1.25 meter diameter engines at the bottom.

I like that lander a lot. I’m planning an Orion/SLS revamp down the line, so that may well make it in as a part of that.
Cool! I look forward to seeing it.

Your mods are awesome! Are you planning to introduce a single segment shuttle SRB (or Castor 300) for use as a second stage for OmegAAAAAAAA?

2 hours ago, DiscountSpaceNerd said:

Your mods are awesome! Are you planning to introduce a single segment shuttle SRB (or Castor 300) for use as a second stage for OmegAAAAAAAA?

At this stage I am not planning on doing anything with the SRBs - they are rather old parts and don’t hold up art-wise compared with the rest of the mod. I would recommend Photon Corp for SRBs - in future I’d like to deprecate the existing SRBs and have some sort of integration with Photon, but still considering how to this.

im having an issue with the plumes of the SSMEs and the shuttle srbs

the SSMEs display the wrong plume and the srbs have no plumes

...what docking port is used for the Orion? I've been looking through my parts list in-game and was unable to find anything resembling the screenshots on the first page, and I also couldn't find any docking port in the mod's files.

On top of that, the Ares I seems to have an extremely high TWR if built as suggested. But then again, I believe the real one did have a pretty obscene TWR too.

For some reason the Olympus S4-Jumbo External Cryogenic Tank only have oxidizer.

1 hour ago, Drehverschluss said:

For some reason the Olympus S4-Jumbo External Cryogenic Tank only have oxidizer.

You probably need Community Resource Pack, a dependency of this, for the liquid hydrogen resource to fill the rest of the tank.

For some reason the Olympus S4-Jumbo External Cryogenic Tank only have oxidizer.

Do you have any mods installed that add fuel switching that could be interfering?

EDIT: Allright i just found it. Now since you told me that other fuel siwtching mods could be the problem i start looking for those. The first i removed was all the "Interstellar Extended" stuff and voala it works now.

I just hope this doesnt break my savefile.

The docking port from Benjee s other mod , Habtech2

On 12/6/2020 at 6:39 PM, wasmic said:

...what docking port is used for the Orion? I've been looking through my parts list in-game and was unable to find anything resembling the screenshots on the first page, and I also couldn't find any docking port in the mod's files.

On top of that, the Ares I seems to have an extremely high TWR if built as suggested. But then again, I believe the real one did have a pretty obscene TWR too.

The Orion docking port is included as part of Benjee10_sharedAssets, which is bundled in the download. You should be able ot find it in-game by searching for HabTech or APAS in the VAB.
